resources.string: This screen steps you through granting the permissions needed by this app.

Usage access is required to see your actual mobile data usage. Android considers this a special permission so there are a few steps required.
First, click on the image to open the system Usage access screen. You\'ll see \"NUD\" listed, and maybe some other apps like Google Play Services.
Next, click on NUD and enable the "Permit usage access" switch.
Finally, click your device's Back button twice to return to this screen.
Permission to make and manage phone calls is also required to see your mobile data usage. This app will never actually make phone calls.
Chart showing your current data usage
Don\'t have permission to read data usage. Click to fix

This app requires two permissions to work properly. The next two screens will step you through granting the required permissions.

The first permission is "make and manage phone calls". The app doesn't actually make phone calls, but this permission is required to identify mobile data usage separately from wifi usage.

The second permission is "Usage access". This permission is needed to actually read the mobile data usage counter.

This app requires two permissions to work properly. The next two screens will step you through granting the required permissions.

The first permission is "make and manage phone calls". The app doesn't actually make phone calls, but this permission is required to identify mobile data usage separately from wifi usage.

The second permission is "Usage access". This permission is needed to actually read the mobile data usage counter.
Do you want to continue without granting permissions? The app won\'t be able to display your mobile data usage unless
